{# #} Team Introductory Video {# #}

{#

Create an Introductory Video


#}

An Opportunity to introduce your team to engaged couples.

Get your whole team behind one camera and tell couples why you do what you do.

Guidelines
90 seconds or less
One continuous shot
No after effects

Tips
Use your phone to record and upload.
Ensure that your voice sounds clear

File format
Widescreen 16:9
.mp4, .avi or .mov

{{ videoForm.as_p }} {# {{ videoUrl }}#}
